name: Diamond Stacks
description:
Diamond Stacks is a fun & challenging match-3 game, to play just move the gems to make matches of 3 or more before the gems overflow or time runs out.

Features:
- Fun Addictive Match 3 gameplay.
- Beautiful Graphics, Retina Macs supported.
- Great Music and Sound Effects.
- Lots of Levels to complete.
- Special power balls to make great combos.
- 3 Difficulty settings.
- Close any time and resume later.

Great time killer for puzzle lovers!

More info at www.boviosoft.com
